online.title: Would you like to open account online?
online.subtitle: We suggest using step-by-step instruction for opening an account:
online.step2text1: Confirm that you are familiar with
online.step2text1_2: Conditions for providing Online booking services of current account
online.step2text2: Please check the correctness of your information while filling in the application
online.step3text1: Enter confirmation code, received via SMS and press “Next”
online.step4text1: Congratulations! You have successfully booked an account!
online.step4text2: You will receive SMS with a temporary password to enter mobile application, where your details will be shown and where you can attach necessary documents to open an account.
online.step5text1: After sending documents, you will be contacted by the manager for the account activation.
online.step6text1: Your manager will come to any convenient place - home, office or cafe. At the meeting, the manager checks the documents previously received electronically with the originals.
online.step6text2: Sign the card with signature sample and the manager will activate the account right at the meeting.

benefits.title: Advantages
benefits.1text: Open account online for free, without visiting bank outlet
benefits.2text: Free connection to the Internet Banking system
benefits.3text: Free connection and usage of the mobile application “StarBusiness”
benefits.4text: Minimum package of documents for opening an account
benefits.5text: Online currency conversion at an exchange rate in real time without commission

order.title: Get a consultation
order.subtitle: Leave your contacts and we will consult you!
order.agree: I agree with the processing of data and
order.safety: We guarantee the safety and security of your data

lks.title: Credit limit on the account
lks.1text1: Submitting an application in a couple of clicks in the mobile application “StarBusiness”
lks.1text2: Getting a loan without applications and signing contracts in 1 second
lks.1text3: Automatic revision of the limit amount on a monthly basis, depending on your turnover
lks.1text4: No commission for setting the limit
lks.2text4: Starting credit limit for new clients * - individual entrepreneur 100,000 ₸, legal entities - 200,000 ₸
lks.2text5: Limit period - for 12 months, with automatic prolongation
lks.2text6: Financing term within the limit - 30 calendar days
lks.2text7: *with a term of registration of legal entities / individual entrepreneurs - at least 3 months, as well as in the absence of negative credit history
lks.3text1: Repayment of the principal debt - automatically, upon receipt of funds on the current account
lks.3text2: Calculation of remuneration and commission for managing the limit on the 1st day of each month (for the previous month of using the limit). The deadline for payment of remuneration and commission is from the 1st to the 10th day of each month.
lks.3text3: The remuneration is automatically debited from the current account.
lks.3text4: Commission repayment is carried out by automatic debiting from the current account or at the expense of the limit, in case of insufficient own funds.
lks.4total: The total amount paid by the limit:
lks.5: List of documents for opening a current account:
lks.5text1: For individual entrepreneurs, persons engaged in private practice
lks.5text3: For branches and representative offices of resident legal entities
lks.5text5: For branches and representative offices of non-resident legal entities
lks.6text7: From the maximum sample (development) of the limit for the last month
lks.6text8: Commission for the withdrawal of borrowed funds or transfer of borrowed funds to the Customer's accounts opened with Bank CenterCredit JSC or other STB
lks.6text11: Accrued on overdue debt on the product “Credit limit on the account“ for each day of delay

useful.title: Together with the account the following will be available:
useful.1text1: Free opening and maintaining a foreign currency account
useful.1text2: Online currency conversion at the exchange rate
useful.1text3: Online receipt of an account number in 1 hour
useful.1text4: Automatic notification of a client through the Internet Banking System about the receipt of funds
useful.1text5: Crediting funds to the account immediately after currency control
useful.1text6: Free preliminary contract review and consultation in case you start working with a new partner or enter into a new deal
useful.2text1: Free connection to the Internet banking system
useful.2text2: Free connection and use of the “StarBusiness” mobile application
useful.2text4: External transfers and payments in national currency until 18:30, in foreign currency until 18:00
useful.3text11: – for legal entities – no more than 190 000 000 ₸
useful.3text12: – for individual entrepreneurs – no more than 50 000 000 ₸
useful.4text1: Receive a tender guarantee online from 20 minutes
useful.4text2: Without collateral for turnover at any bank
useful.4text6: Possibility of registration and receipt in other regions of Kazakhstan
useful.5text2: Free issue and delivery of cards
